value: What's the matter, <name>? Cat got your tongue?
I certainly thought you would have more to say than that, <name>
Have I rendered you speechless, <name>?
C'mon then, spit it out, <name>!
Want to get some coffee at Dunkin <name>?
<name>, want to get some coffee at Starbucks?
<name>, do we dare meetup at Peet's?
Hey <name>, would you want to be a hipster and meetup for tea?
How are you today, <name>?
What's on your mind, <name> ?
You look blue, <name>. Would you like to talk about it?
What would you like to talk about, <name>?
Is something troubling you <name>, would you like to talk about it?
You seem happy <name>, why is that?
You've left me speechless!
I just don't know what to say.
Are you hearing yourself right now?
I'm not sure I understand.
Perhaps you should clarify.
That was about as clear as mud.
Thank you for that......insight.
